NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Procedure 0..* ProcedureUvIps An action that is being or was performed on a patient
status 1..1 code preparation | in-progress | not-done | on-hold | stopped | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
Binding: EventStatus (required)
code
coding 1..1 CodingIPS A reference to a code defined by a terminology system
system 0..1 uri Identity of the terminology system
Binding: Procedures - IPS (required)
subject 1..1 Reference(RareLink IPS Patient) Who the procedure was performed on
identifier S 0..1 Identifier Logical reference, when literal reference is not known
bodySite
coding
system 0..1 uri Identity of the terminology system
Required Pattern: http://snomed.info/sct
